src:
Growers: NYPD confiscated hemp thinking it was pot
Hemp legal in all 50 states

07 Nov 2019, 04:14

NEW HAVEN, Vt. - - Growers say cops ignored documentation showing the product the seized was actually hemp, now legal in all 50 states.
